name: [Title Sold Separately]
description:
Pay to win? Pay to win.

Keyboard controls:

Left/A - Move Left

Right/D - Move Right

Z - Jump

X - Dash

Enter (THE MOST IMPORTANT ONE) - Shop Menu (YAY PROFITS)

Gamepad controls:

Left stick/Left D-Pad - Move Left

Right stick/Right D-Pad - Move Right

A - Jump

B - Dash

Start (THE MOST IMPORTANT ONE) - Shop Menu (YAY PROFITS)

F11 for fullscreen
